entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Potential Deadlock in GC Allocate via RhpNewArray #105780
  • System.Net.Quic.Functional.Tests.CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates failed #105778
  • Avoid building `StringBuilder` in `DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler` #105775
  • DefineUninitializedData on TypeBuilder in System.Reflection.Emit uses typeof(ValueType) internally even when using a MetadataLoadContext #105772
  • Provide API to allow JSON converters/types to describe their associated JSON schema #105769
    10.0.0
  • iOS: HttpClient threads don't finish #105767
  • Improve the perf of `Complex <op> double` #105759
    10.0.0
  • [iOS/tvOS] BigInteger tests running out-of-memory #105753
  • Regex internal static cache: new regex instances are treated as 'oldest' ones and removed after cache is full (LRU may not work) #105748
  • Implement support for a modern password hashing algorithm #105745
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: `WhereIn` and `WhereInBy` LINQ operators #105743
  • Using UnsafeAccessorAttribute throws BadImageFormatException on .NET9-preview6 #105738
  • Arm64/Sve: Sve_Multiply tests failing #105736
    9.0.0
  • InterpPgoTests.FirstRunGeneratesTableAndSecondRunLoadsIt failing #105733

Closed

  • JIT: Flow Graph Modernization and Improved Block Layout #93020
    10.0.0
  • Intel architecture improvements for .NET 9 #93196
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeBinder: A field being used after checking it for null #94184
  • Placing DAM on a Type array crashes illink #104761
    9.0.0
  • Cannot use CryptoStream with read-only stream #105592
    Future
  • Test failure: profiler/gc/nongcheap/nongcheap.sh #105005
    9.0.0
  • [wasm][hotreload] Cannot build `ApplyUpdateReferencedAssembly` with source link #62618
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'estimatedSize >= actualSize' during 'Emit code' #105693
    9.0.0
  • Allow `DefaultValueAttribute` with primitives when `System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute.IsSupported` disabled #103542
    9.0.0
  • Debugging not working with self-contained single file .NET6 assemblies #84428
    10.0.0
  • Suspected CodeGen Bug in a User-Defined AsyncMethodBuilder #104274
  • [API Proposal]: Migrate `HybridCache` from aspnet to runtime #100290
    9.0.0
  • Using Raylib APIs in Blazor WebAssembly #96384
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad constant folding with `ShiftLogicalVariable` #105742
    9.0.0
  • Access violation in CEEInfo::getCallInfo #105710
  • Possible storage leak in nethost.cpp #50146
    Future
  • HttpRequestException Lacks StatusCode Information on ProxyTunnelError #105546
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Provide tunnel status code for proxy exceptions #66329
    Future
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 7 Regressions on 12/12/2023 12:38:01 AM #96030
    9.0.0
  • [mono][perf] iOS disk size regression on 14 Apr 2023 #85451
    9.0.0
  • [Perf][Mono] Linux/x64 Regressions due to rewritten of Matrix3x2 and Matrix4x4 #80569
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'tree->OperIs(GT_LCL_VAR)' during 'Mark local vars' #105669
    9.0.0
  • vsdbg quits when resuming from a breakpoint if stepping over a line that throws an exception #95189
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Runtime crash in full AOT mode when using `LiteDB` #91332
    9.0.0
  • [mono][maccatalyst] MacCatalyst template app crashes in AOT+interp mode in .NET 8 #105510
    8.0.x
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #99521
    9.0.0
  • DeflateStream: reading to buffer error #105744
  • Question: Process.PrivateMemorySize64 - Differences between Debian/Ubuntu vs Alpine based images #100760
  • Name parsing in System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive #105729

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono][debug] Fixing AV on accessing source_file_list that is NULL #105781
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix copy constructor injection for unsafe value classes #105779
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • JIT: Add out-of-bounds fallback for AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical #105777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Char and Rune #105773
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix IntelliSense for gc.cpp #105768
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #105765
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Add [DebuggerDisplay] to CancellationTokenSource #105764
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Update Android App Maui rollback generation #105763
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105762
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Add support for doubly nested intrinsic classes #105761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • make Select_LargeNumber_Succcess exclusive #105751
    area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug
  • [NRBF] Don't use Unsafe.As when decoding DateTime(s) #105749
    area-System.Formats.Nrbf, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing tests for GatherVectorByteOffsets (#105568) #105747
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Assign latest virtual timestamp for added node to enable LRU manner of RegexCache #105746
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Implement DFEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP for LA64. #105741
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Add gcinfodumper related implementation. #105740
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [release/8.0-staging] Stop building AppHost in native AOT testing #105739
    Servicing-approved, blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ARM64-SVE: Fix conditional select for Zeroing predicates (#102904) #105737
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert "Use IndexOf for bounded loops in a regex code gen" #105735
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 9.0.0
  • Eventpipe block unregister for callbacks #105734
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix check for types interesting to dataflow #105642
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix race condition in nongcheap.cpp test #105658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add missing break statement #104286
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasm][hotreload] Add explanation to workaround for build `ApplyUpdateReferencedAssembly` with source link #105758
    arch-wasm, area-EnC-mono, 9.0.0
  • Ensure that we add the broadcast and mask flags prior to computing the instruction size #105757
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Alphabetically order the SVE API (#104834) #105760
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support [DefaultValue] when new feature switch is disabled #105766
    area-System.ComponentModel, 9.0.0
  • Adjust IP after an AV during an STEP with FEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP enabled #105633
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Do not separate header comments from function definitions #105754
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Update generated ILLink analyzer tests #105643
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Enable some reflection emit tests on Mono #105662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix constant folding for shift SIMD operators #105752
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging when JMC is enabled #105756
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Store status code in exception for ProxyTunnelError #105610
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip `GT_LCL_FLD` stress if `GTF_VAR_CONTEXT` is set #105726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Condition dwarfdebug on WasmNativeDebugSymbols #105727
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Add timeout to QuicConnectionTests for StreamsAvailable tests #105699
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][MT] show progress in problematic unit tests #105680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V,QEMU] Disable execution of two corefx tests on QEMU #105689
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution

Updated

  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add Keep-Alive Ping and Timeout implementation #105672
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • add new JsonIgnoreAttribute WhenWriting/WhenReading #104562
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implement basic (recommended against) support for inheriting from COM interfaces defined in different assemblies #105119
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Convert exception throwing JIT helpers to managed code. #105671
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow explicitly implemented ISimdVector APIs to be handled as intrinsic #104983
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 10.0.0
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] http streaming request server error #105709
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2506404 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Add DI specification test for ensuring externally provided instance services are not disposed on provider disposal. #104853
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix problem in ReadyToRun_TypeGenericInfoMap::HasConstraints #105728
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix PHI non-null pattern #104493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Check for potential store-to-load forwarding before reordering ldr -> ldp #105695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Reapply "Remove zlib from requirements script and instruction files"" #105450
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression, blocked, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Heap snapshot system for WASM #105713
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO, blocked, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Document the use of non-short-circuiting `|` operator in `Char::IsAsciiLetterOrDigit` #102547
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Add missing tests for LoadVector*() #105703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: add missing test coverage for invalid immediate (#104809) #105677
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove support for older LLVM versions, and re-order linker flags #105110
    area-Build-mono
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Remove short branches #105386
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
